parameters.name: ActionName
parameters.description: The action name of the playbook.

parameters.name: Aliuid
parameters.description: The user ID receiving the message.

parameters.name: AssetId
parameters.description: Resource instance ID. This parameter is currently deprecated and no longer in use.

parameters.name: ChannelTypeList
parameters.description: Collection of channel types. If not provided, all channels will be used by default, and it is not required to provide this parameter by default.

parameters.name: ComponentName
parameters.description: The component name of the playbook.

parameters.name: EventId
parameters.description:
Cloud Pigeon's message event ID. Values:
- yundun_soar_incident_generate: Incident generation.
- yundun_soar_alert_generate: Alert generation.
- yundun_soar_incident_update: Incident update.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language type for requesting and receiving messages. Values:
- **zh** (default): Chinese.
- **en**: English.

parameters.name: NodeName
parameters.description: The node name of the playbook.

parameters.name: Params
parameters.description:
Template parameters for the message event.
- For incident generation: aliyunUID, incidentName, incidentID, startTime
- For alert generation: aliyunUID, alertName, alertID, startTime
- For incident update: aliyunUID, incidentName, incidentID, startTime, endTime, status, level

parameters.name: PlaybookUuid
parameters.description:
The UUID of the playbook.
> You can obtain this parameter by calling the [DescribePlaybooks](~~DescribePlaybooks~~) interface.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The user ID when an administrator switches to another member's perspective.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
View type. Values:
- 0 (default): Current Alibaba Cloud account view.
- 1: View for all accounts under the enterprise.
